  • Description: LEAKING PACKAGE INSIDE IS A 5 GALLON BUCKET OF CELL SOAK 2000 SAFETY DATE SHEET IN BOX INDICATES PRODUCT IS A UN1760, CORRODIVE LIQUID, N.O.S. (CONTAINS POTASSIUM HYDROXIDE),8, PG II NO OUTER PACKEGE MARKING ON BOX TO REFLECT THIS BUCKET HAD LOOSE LID AND LEAKED APPRX. 3 OUNCES THERE WERE FOAM PEANUTS MORE THAN TWO INCHES INSIDE BOX FOR PACKING MATERIAL

item.description:
Report X-2025051640

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-15
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: PACKAGE WAS LEAKING BUT OUTER BOX WAS NOT DENTED/TORN/DAMAGED ETC. THE INTERNAL CANS WERE LEAKING FROM THE CLOSURES. THE CAPS WERE LOOSE BUT THE INTERNAL DISCS SEALING THE SPOUTS WERE NOT TIGHT ENOUGH TO PREVENT LEAKAGE.

item.title: Report E-2025050407
item.description:
Report E-2025050407

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-22T01:13:25+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-25
  • City: SALT LAKE CITY
  • State: UT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO ENTERPRISE SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: At 2306 ET, XPO notified ERTS of a cargo release at terminal USU. It was reported that approximately 1-pint of "UN-OBSCUREDâ„¢" released from 2 plastic pails due to improper loading. The release impacted inside of trailer #3173269. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the caller and determined that terminal personnel are capable of cleaning the release with PPE available on site. XPO will place the waste inside of a 55-gallon poly drum.
